title: ItemBox Editor
compatibleWarning: [Warning] Your game version is NOT compatible with this mod:
backupSaveWarning:
[Warning]
Please backup your save before using this mod !
Do NOT modify items that are not released, or you may get banned !
changeItemTip: [Tips] After change, please close and reopen the ItemBox to refresh !
changeItemWarning:
[Warning]
This MOD does NOT check the legality, please make sure the item you modified can be put into the ItemBox !
changeItemNumInputError: [Error] Please input an integer between 0 and 9999
nameNgWordWarning: [Warning] Please do NOT use sensitive words, or you may get banned !
hunterNameMaxLengthWarning: [Error] Hunter Name must be less than 10 characters !
otomoNameMaxLengthWarning: [Error] Otomo Name must be less than 10 characters !
nameResetReloadGameTip: [Tips] Please save and restart the game to take effect !
